definition: old name for the 黎[Li2] ethnic group
rustic/vulgar/unrefined/abbr. for 俚語|俚语[li3 yu3], slang

sentences.english: In order for slang to be slangy, it has to have a feeling of perpetual newness.
sentences.chinese: 成爲俚語的必要條件是有一種常新的感覺。

sentences.english: After all, slang is, by definition, more clever than standard English.
sentences.chinese: 就其特徵而言，畢竟俚語比標準英語更伶俐。

sentences.english: She takes all ears to what her mother have said.
sentences.chinese: 是美國常用的俚語，表示“洗耳恭聽”之意。

sentences.english: In his hands, comic jargon and dialect became a finished literary weapon .
sentences.chinese: 在他的手裏，詼諧的方言，俚語成了完美的文字武器。

sentences.english: Cockney is English spoken in the poor eastern neighbourhoods of London, England.
sentences.chinese: 這種同韻俚語很像倫敦東區人說的英語。

sentences.english: He notices some slang that was headlined in the newspapers recently.
sentences.chinese: 最近，他注意到有些俚語出現在了報紙的標題上。

sentences.english: Jomo is slang for cock in Mr Wainaina's boarding school.
sentences.chinese: “喬莫”在他的寄宿學校裏就是“生殖器”的俚語。

sentences.english: Read on, to learn more about Cockney rhyming slang.
sentences.chinese: 接着讀一讀吧，來更多地瞭解一下老倫敦的押韻俚語。

sentences.english: Some slangs finally did find their way to be part of the standard English.
sentences.chinese: 一些俚語最終成了標準英語的一部分。

sentences.english: You can learn a lot of slangs and colloquial languages in songs.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在歌曲中學到很多俚語和口語。

sentences.english: Here you'll find stories, jokes, idioms and American slang, both in English and Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 這裏可以發現小故事，笑話，成語和美國俚語。

sentences.english: It was a perfectly composed bit of slang, a minor triumph of Yankee ingenuity.
sentences.chinese: 有些像是絕妙的俚語，也是北方佬近乎天才般的勝利。

sentences.english: The word has been elevated from the status of slang to colloquialism.
sentences.chinese: 這個詞已經從俚語提高到口語的地位。

sentences.english: I always have slangs at the tip of my tongue and ready to use at the drop of a hat.
sentences.chinese: 我舌頭尖上總備着各種俚語，隨時準備逮着機會就用。

sentences.english: Are slang words or tough language outside My ken?
sentences.chinese: 鄙俗俚語或粗暴的言語是在我的知識範圍之外嗎？

definition: tone/note/a tone (on a Chinese syllable)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to make far-fetched claims (idiom)/to offer outlandish explanations
to transliterate/to transcribe/to transfer words onto a surface by direct contact (as with a decal)
